Property.name: Restrictions
Property.val: Please refer to the cancer protocol cover page (www.cap.org/cancerprotocols) for information about which tumor types and procedures can be reported using this template.

ListItem.title: Intraductal papillary neoplasm with an associated invasive carcinoma

ListItem.title: Large cell carcinoma with rhabdoid phenotype

ListItem.title: Solid-pseudopapillary neoplasm with high grade carcinoma

Question.name: Q_379521
Question.title: Site(s) Involved by Direct Tumor Extension

ListItem.name: LI_34033
ListItem.title: No invasion (carcinoma in situ / high-grade dysplasia, including pancreatic intraepithelial neoplasia III)

ListItem.name: LI_34036
ListItem.title: Vascular bed / groove (corresponding to superior mesenteric vein / portal vein)

ListItem.name: LI_19268
ListItem.title: Ampulla of Vater or sphincter of Oddi

ListItem.name: LI_35497
ListItem.title: Present, with no viable cancer cells (complete response, score 0)

ListItem.name: LI_35498
ListItem.title: Present, with single cells or rare small groups of cancer cells (near complete response, score 1)

ListItem.name: LI_35499
ListItem.title: Present, with residual cancer showing evident tumor regression, but more than single cells or rare small groups of cancer cells (partial response, score 2)

ListItem.name: LI_35500
ListItem.title: Absent, with extensive residual cancer and no evident tumor regression (poor or no response, score 3)

ListItem.name: LI_366966
ListItem.title: All margins negative for invasive carcinoma

Question.title: Distance from Invasive Carcinoma to Closest Margin

Question.title: Margin Status for Dysplasia and Intraepithelial Neoplasia

ListItem.name: LI_366994
ListItem.title: All margins negative for dysplasia and intraepithelial neoplasia

ListItem.name: LI_366995
ListItem.title: Pancreatic high-grade intraepithelial neoplasia present at margin

Question.name: Q_366999
Question.title: Margin(s) Involved by Pancreatic High-Grade Intraepithelial Neoplasia

ListItem.name: LI_367004
ListItem.title: High-grade intraepithelial neoplasia present at bile duct margin

ListItem.name: LI_10625
ListItem.title: Not applicable (no regional lymph nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_356420
ListItem.title: All regional lymph nodes negative for tumor

ListItem.name: LI_356425
ListItem.title: Tumor present in regional lymph node(s)

Question.title: Number of Lymph Nodes with Tumor

Section.name: S_5681
Section.title: PATHOLOGIC STAGE CLASSIFICATION (pTNM, AJCC 8th Edition) (Note I)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_46410
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_46410_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

ListItem.name: LI_327714
ListItem.title: pT not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_54067
DisplayedItem.title: # Size of invasive component should be used for determining the T category.

ListItem.name: LI_5684
ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor

ListItem.name: LI_37875
ListItem.title: pTis: Carcinoma in situ (This includes high-grade pancreatic intraepithelial neoplasia (PanIN-3), intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasm with high-grade dysplasia, intraductal tubulopapillary neoplasm with high-grade dysplasia, and mucinous cystic neoplasm with high-grade dysplasia.)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_40428
DisplayedItem.title: pT1: Tumor less than or equal to 2 cm in greatest dimension

ListItem.name: LI_37880
ListItem.title: pT1a:Tumor less than or equal to 0.5 cm in greatest dimension

ListItem.name: LI_37881
ListItem.title: pT1b: Tumor greater than 0.5 cm and less than 1 cm in greatest dimension

ListItem.name: LI_37882
ListItem.title: pT1c: Tumor 1-2 cm in greatest dimension

ListItem.name: LI_37877
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor greater than 2 cm and less than or equal to 4 cm in greatest dimension

ListItem.name: LI_37878
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor greater than 4 cm in greatest dimension

ListItem.name: LI_37879
ListItem.title: pT4: Tumor involves the celiac axis or the superior mesenteric artery, and / or common hepatic artery, regardless of size

ListItem.name: LI_327716
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327717
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_5692
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_37886
ListItem.title: pN1: Metastasis in one to three regional lymph nodes

ListItem.name: LI_37887
ListItem.title: pN2: Metastasis in four or more regional lymph nodes

ListItem.name: LI_19287
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_19287_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)
